text: Washington ( CNN ) The White House press office is getting a bit more Sunshine these days - - former Disney Channel star Caroline Sunshine, that is. She's joining the team as a press assistant. Sunshine, 22, is known for her role alongside Zendaya as Tinka Hessenheffer in ` ` Shake It Up,'' a Disney Channel show about teen dancers that ran from 2010 to 2013. She was also in the 2010 film ` ` Marmaduke,'' among other roles. The California native has established her career apart from the entertainment industry ; she was most recently a White House intern. ` ` Caroline Sunshine was a White House intern.
